blocks.name: topmtcl
blocks.content: The meet of a collection of topologies on ` X ` is again a topology on ` X ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Oct-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: topmeet
blocks.content: Two equivalent formulations of the meet of a collection of topologies. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Oct-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)

thm topmeet(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wceq(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cuni(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wceq(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cuni(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqssd(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cuni(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wss(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cuni(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  topmtcl(c0, c1, c2)
  mpbiran2(wcel(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1))))
  rgen(s1, c2, wss(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1)))
  syl5ss(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1), cint(c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  inss2(cpw(c0), cint(c2))
  intss1(cv(s1), c2)
  elrab(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s1, c2, wss(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1))))
  ralbidv(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2))), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1)))
  sseq1(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1))
  elssuni(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wss(cuni(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2))), wss(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cpw(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)))))
  rabssdv(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), cpw(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  sylibr(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)))), wss(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2))))
  ssind(cv(s0), cpw(c0), cint(c2), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(cv(s0), cpw(c0)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wss(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wss(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s0))))
  toponuni(cv(s0), c0)
  eqimss2(c0, cuni(cv(s0)))
  sspwuni(cv(s0), c0)
  sylibr(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(cv(s0), cint(c2)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ssint(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  selpw(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)))
  sspwuni(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)))
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c2, wss(cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1)))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)))
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(c0), cint(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cint.s(s1, c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cint(c2)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, cpw(c0), cint(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c0)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm topmeet(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0))→(P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)= ⋃ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0))→(P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)= ⋃ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)}), d(s1, c1))
  eqssd((P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), ⋃ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)}, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0)))
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0)), (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)⊆ ⋃ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)}, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)∈ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)})
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0)), (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)∈ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)}, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)∈(TopOn ` c0))
  topmtcl(c0, c1, c2)
  mpbiran2((P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)∈ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)}, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)∈(TopOn ` c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)⊆ s1))
  rgen(s1, c2, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)⊆ s1)
  syl5ss((P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), s1, ⋂ c2, s1 ∈ c2)
  inss2(P(c0), ⋂ c2)
  intss1(s1, c2)
  elrab(s0, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), (TopOn ` c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)⊆ s1))
  ralbidv(s1, c2, s0 =(P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), s0 ⊆ s1, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)⊆ s1)
  sseq1(s0, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), s1)
  elssuni((P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)})
  sylib((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0)), ⋃ { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)} ⊆(P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), { s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)} ⊆ P((P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)))
  rabssdv(s0, (TopOn ` c0), P((P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0)), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1))
  sylibr(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0))∧ s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)), s0 ∈ P((P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)), s0 ⊆(P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2))
  ssind(s0, P(c0), ⋂ c2, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0))∧ s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)))
  3ad2ant2((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0)), s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1), s0 ⊆ P(c0))
  sylibr(s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), s0 ⊆ P(c0), ⋃ s0 ⊆ c0)
  syl(s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), ⋃ s0 ⊆ c0, c0 = ⋃ s0)
  toponuni(s0, c0)
  eqimss2(c0, ⋃ s0)
  sspwuni(s0, c0)
  sylibr(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0))∧ s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)), s0 ⊆ ⋂ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1))
  simp3((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0)), s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1))
  ssint(s1, s0, c2)
  selpw(s0, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2))
  sspwuni({ s0 ∈(TopOn ` c0)| ∀(s1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ s1)}, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2))
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c2, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2)⊆ s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2), s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2))
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(c0), ⋂ c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cint.s(s1, c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (P(c0)⋂ ⋂ c2))
  diff.cin.s(s0, P(c0), ⋂ c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆(TopOn ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, (TopOn ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c0)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: topjoin
blocks.content: Two equivalent formulations of the join of a collection of topologies. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Oct-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)

thm topjoin(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wceq(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cint(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cint(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wss(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cint(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wral(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wi(wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wss(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wi(wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wss(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cv(s0))))
  expr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wss(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cv(s0)))

  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), ctop))
  topontop(cv(s0), c0)
  unssd(csn(c0), cuni(c2), cv(s0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  snssd(c0, cv(s0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
  toponmax(cv(s0), c0)
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wss(cuni(c2), cv(s0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  unissb(s1, c2, cv(s0))
  tgfiss(cv(s0), cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))
  ssintrab(s0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wss(cint(crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2))))), wcel(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), crab(s0, cfv(ctopon, c0), wral(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))

  tgtopon(cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2))))

  3eqtr3d(c0, cuni(cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2)))), cun(c0, cuni(cuni(c2))), cuni(cun(csn(c0), cuni(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))))

  uniun(csn(c0), cuni(c2))
  uneq1d(cuni(csn(c0)), cuni(cuni(c2)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))))

  unisng(c0, c1)
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0))), wceq(cun(c0, cuni(cuni(c2))), c0), wss(cuni(cuni(c2)), c0))

  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0)))

  sylibr(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wss(cv(s0), cpw(c0)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wss(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wss(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s0))))
  toponuni(cv(s0), c0)
  eqimss2(c0, cuni(cv(s0)))
  sspwuni(cv(s0), c0)
  selpw(s0, cpw(c0))
  sspwuni(c2, cpw(c0))

thm fnejoin1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2)→ c3[Fne]if(c2 = ∅, { c0 }, ⋃ c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  breqtrrd(c3, cfne, if(c2 = ∅, { c0 }, ⋃ c2), ⋃ c2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2), c3[Fne]⋃ c2, ⋃ c3 = ⋃ ⋃ c2, c3 ⊆(topGen ` ⋃ c2))
  eqssd(⋃ c3, ⋃ ⋃ c2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  unissd(c3, ⋃ c2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  sseqtrd(⋃ ⋃ c2, ⋃ c3, c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  sylib((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2), ⋃ ⋃ c2 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c2 ⊆ P(c0))
  sspwuni(⋃ c2, c0)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0), c3 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ c3)
  rspccva(s0, c2, c3, c0 = ⋃ s0, c0 = ⋃ c3)
  eqeq2d(c0, ⋃ s0, ⋃ c3, s0 = c3)
  unieq(s0, c3)
  sstrd(c3, (topGen ` ⋃ c2), ⋃ c2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0), c3 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ ⋃ c2)
  elssuni(c3, c2)
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2), ⋃ c2 ⊆(topGen ` ⋃ c2), ⋃ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexd(⋃ c2, P(c0), universe, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0), c3 ∈ c2, P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2), ⋃ c2 ⊆ P(c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ P(c0)))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0), c3 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ P(c0)))
  ralimi(s0, c2, c0 = ⋃ s0, s0 ⊆ P(c0))
  sylibr(c0 = ⋃ s0, s0 ⊆ P(c0), ⋃ s0 ⊆ c0)
  eqimss2(c0, ⋃ s0)
  sspwuni(s0, c0)
  unissb(s0, c2, P(c0))
  bastg(⋃ c2, universe)
  isfne4(c3, ⋃ c2, ⋃ c3, ⋃ ⋃ c2)
  eqid(⋃ c3)
  eqid(⋃ ⋃ c2)
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0)∧ c3 ∈ c2), if(c2 = ∅, { c0 }, ⋃ c2)= ⋃ c2, c2 ≠ ∅)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c0 = ⋃ s0), c3 ∈ c2, c2 ≠ ∅)
  ne0i(c3, c2)
  ifnefalse(c2, emptycls, { c0 }, ⋃ c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, ⋃ c3)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c3)
}
